body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ralph Coleman and the customer's name is Joan Perez.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am with BrightSolutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm just exploring some options for internet services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s great to hear! Can I start by asking for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, David! To better assist you, could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s nine zero one one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also share your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s two zero two, five six seven, eight one four three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, David. I have noted your information. Based on your zip code, we have some great options available.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I will send you a detailed email with all the options after our call. Thank you for your time today, David, and for sharing your information!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a wonderful day!
